description: There was a mass exodus of executives from presidential advisory councils as they opposed stances taken by President Trump.
title: The Business Leaders Who Were on Trump’s Advisory Councils
title_page: The Business Leaders Who Were on Trump’s Advisory Councils - The New York Times
